title: 100 % RLNG supply restored to power, gas sectors: Hammad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 5 (APP): Minister for Energy Division Hammad Azhar on Monday said that 100 percent supply of RLNG has been restored to the power and gas sectors.
“No forced load-shedding has been carried out since Friday evening,” he tweeted.
He said, “We were restoring normal gas pressure supply to all sectors from today”.
